thought: To craft a glass_bottle, I need to first craft 3 glass. This requires 3 sand, which is available in slot 10. Therefore I will smelt the sand in slot 10 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 10 to slot 11 with quantity 1
